title: Start
body:
Every Who Down in Whoville Liked Christmas a lot... But the Grinch who lived just north of Whoville, Did NOT! The Grinch hated Christmas! The whole Christmas season!

Now, please don't ask why. No one quite knows the reason. He stood there on Christmas Eve, hating the Whos, staring down from his cave with a sour, Grinchy frown.


[[Next|Option2]]

title: option3
body:
Every Who down in Whoville, the tall and the small, would stand close together, with Christmas bells ringing. They'd stand hand-in-hand. And the Whos would start singing!

And the more the Grinch thought of this Who Christmas Sing, the more the Grinch thought, "I must stop this whole thing! Why, for fifty-three years I've put up with it now! I MUST stop this Christmas from coming! But HOW?"

[[next|option4]] |]]

title: option4
body:
Then he got an idea! An awful idea! THE GRINCH GOT A WONDERFUL, AWFUL IDEA! "I know just what to do!" The Grinch laughed in his throat.

And he made a quick Santy Claus hat and a coat. And he chuckled, and clucked, "What a great Grinchy trick!With this coat and this hat, I look just like Saint Nick! All I need is a reindeer..." 

The Grinch looked around. "If I can't find a reindeer, I'll make one instead!" So he called his dog, Max. THEN he loaded some bags and some old empty sacks, on a ramshackle sleigh and he hitched up old Max.



[[next|option5]]

title: Option2
body:
"Tomorrow is Christmas! It's practically here!" Then he growled, with his Grinch fingers nervously drumming,
"I MUST find some way to stop Christmas from coming!" For Tomorrow, he knew, all the Who girls and boys would wake bright and early. They'd rush for their toys!

[[next|option3]]

title: option5
body:
Then the Grinch said, "Giddap!" And the sleigh started down, toward the homes where the Whos lay asnooze in their town. 
The Grinch slithered and slunk, with a smile most unpleasant, to sneak into Whoville and take every present. The ribbons, the wrappings, the trimmings, the trappings, the food for the feast—all the Who-Christmas trappings!

But the Whos aren't fools—they patrol every street to protect their gifts and the Christmas treat! Now it's YOUR turn to help the Grinch succeed.

Steal the presents, fulfill his need! But beware of the Whovillagers who roam the land, avoid their sights and their reprimanding hand!

[[next|Nextscene]] |]]
